data.message:
You probably don't know who I am , just that I know who you are to me.
You are my second father, I have hope for a better day.
Your songs I shrug me
Your songs make me laugh.
It's beautiful.
Whenever I have a bad day I like to let go of the song "When I'm Gone" and "Beautiful"
I am proud that I can call a "STAN"
I listen to you for 5 years, is the best time of my life
You probably do not read, never on the news you hear, but you're the best. 
Thank you for everything
